articles.description: Borussia Dortmund reach the Champions League quarter-finals for the first time in three years thanks to goals from Jadon Sancho and Marco Reus against PSV Eindhoven.
articles.title: Sancho sends Dortmund into quarter-finals

articles.description: Atletico Madrid dramatically beat Inter Milan on penalties to reach the Champions League quarter-finals and eliminate last season's runners-up.
articles.title: Atletico beat Inter on penalties to reach last eight

articles.description: Bournemouth denied Luton the chance to climb out of the Premier League relegation zone as they came from 3-0 down to win a seven-goal thriller at Vitality Stadium.
articles.title: Bournemouth come from three down to beat Luton

articles.description: Willie Mullins becomes the first person to train 100 Cheltenham Festival winners as his son Patrick rides Jasmin De Vaux to victory in the Champion Bumper.
articles.title: Willie Mullins seals historic 100th Cheltenham Festival win

articles.description: Wales and British & Irish Lions centre George North announces he will quit international rugby after Saturday's Six Nations finale against Italy.
articles.title: North announces retirement from Test rugby

articles.description: American 23rd seed Emma Navarro inflicts a surprise defeat on world number two Aryna Sabalenka in the fourth round of Indian Wells.
articles.title: Indian Wells: World number two Aryna Sabalenka knocked out by Emma Navarro

articles.description: Luton Town captain Tom Lockyer calls the medics who saved his life "heroes" as he returns to Bournemouth to thank them.
articles.title: Lockyer thanks 'hero' medics who saved his life

articles.description: Rory McIlroy is concerned that "fans are losing interest" in watching golf because of the current fragmented nature of the men's professional game.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Players Championship missing best players 'a shame'

articles.description: Trailblazing footballer Josh Cavallo says "it felt right to share this special moment on the pitch" after he proposed to his partner at Adelaide United's Coopers Stadium.
articles.title: Trailblazer Cavallo gets engaged on Adelaide Utd pitch

articles.description: Paris St-Germain are preparing an £80m bid for Manchester United's Marcus Rashford, Chelsea are willing to sell Romelu Lukaku to Saudi clubs, plus more.
articles.title: PSG preparing £80m Rashford bid - Thursday's gossip
